Articles.Content:
Hi All,

Have been playing KSP for a while now and I love it! I'm new to the forums, though (but have been lurking for a while...).

I just thought that it would be very useful to be able to combine a number of parts (with or without a command module) and then re-use them without having to save an entire ship. If the group of parts could be made to appear in a tab in the VAB, this would make re-use of a successful structure much easier. It would allow for quick experimenting with different combinations of rockets and payloads.

Cheers,

Adam
Good day, please see the "What not to suggest" post at the top.Sub assemblies are on that list as an upcoming feature and are also handeld by mods at the moment.
